item.title: [RS2] Auto login
item.dc:creator: @bumfluff120 bumfluff120
item.description:
@bumfluff120 wrote:

[code]{Shorty’s Auto login]
[ (Bumfluff120) ]
[]
[Instructions: ]
[ Drag crosshair onto runescape. ]
[ Enter username and password line 15-16. ]
[ Press green arrow. ]
[]
[Thanks to Moparisthebest for teaching me scripting. ]
[Forgot hotkey to stop? Press f2 to stop script. ]
[*****************************************************}
program Autologin;
const
username = ‘’; //USERNAME
password = ‘’; //PASSWORD

procedure PanicExit;
begin
if(IsFKeyDown(2)) then
terminatescript;
end;

procedure BFmouse(mousex,mousey:integer);
var randx, randy:integer;
begin
MoveMouseSmoothEx(randx,randy,30,30,30,17,5);
end;

procedure Login;
begin
activateclient;
PanicExit;
BFmouse(458, 292);
PanicExit;
sleep(500);
PanicExit;
clickmouse(458, 292, true);
PanicExit;
sleep(500);
PanicExit;
BFmouse(372, 255);
PanicExit;
sleep(500);
PanicExit;
clickmouse(372, 255, true);
PanicExit;
sleep(500);
sendkeys(username);
PanicExit;
sendkeys(chr(13));
PanicExit;
sendkeys(password);
PanicExit;
BFmouse(301, 323);
PanicExit;
sleep(500);
PanicExit;
clickmouse(301, 323, true);
end;

begin
Login;
end.[/code]
